div.p: Severity and preventability of patient safety incidents ( n = 36) as identified by trigger tool

tr.td: Any incident with the potential to cause harm.
Mild harm, inconvenience, further follow-up or investigation to ensure no harm occurred.
Moderate harm: required intervention or duration for longer than a day.
Prolonged, substantial or permanent harm, including hospitalisation.
Not preventable and originated in secondary care.
Preventable and originated in secondary care OR not preventable and originated in primary care.
Potentially preventable and originated in primary care.
Preventable and originated in primary care.
